means: 护理( nurse的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He had nursed an ambition to lead his own big orchestra.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一直有一个梦想，希望能指挥一支自己的顶级管弦乐队。

sentence.Network_en: They had nursed Peter back to some semblance of health.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他们的照料下，彼得貌似恢复了健康。

sentence.Network_en: All the years he was sick my mother had nursed him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他生病的这些年来，我妈妈一直照料着他。

PerfectNetExp.abs: His thick lips nursed a big , black cigar that held white ashes an inch long ., 他那厚厚的嘴唇叨着一支又大又黑的雪茄烟 , 白色的烟灰足有一寸长.
I stayed in bed and nursed my cold ., 我患感冒后卧床养病.
And the women took the child , and nursed it ., 妇人就抱了孩子去奶他.
i was nursed in swaddling clothes , and with great cares ., 我在襁褓中 , 受了母亲的抚育和照顾.

list.abs: 护_百度百科 ... 护士[ nurse] 护士长[ charge sister;head nurse] 护守[ guard].
... Civil Engineer 土木工程师 Registered Nurse 注册护士 Registered Midwife 注册助产士.
1.养老院（nursing homes）可以使许多老人幸福地安度晚年。
在为老年人服务方面，2002年时护理中心(nursing home)有15239家，它们有点像养老院，提供饮食、护理、保健乃至日常娱乐服务， …

entry.def: A nurse is a person whose job is to care for people who are ill.

example.ex: She had spent 29 years as a nurse...
Patients were dying because of an acute shortage of nurses.
example.tran: 因为护理人员严重不足，患者生命垂危。

entry.def: If you nurse someone, you care for them when they are ill.

example.ex: All the years he was sick my mother had nursed him...
example.tran: 他生病的这些年来，我妈妈一直照料着他。

example.ex: She rushed home to nurse her daughter back to health.
example.tran: 她赶回家去，要照顾女儿恢复健康。

entry.def: If you nurse an illness or injury, you allow it to get better by resting as much as possible.

example.ex: We're going to go home and nurse our colds.
example.tran: 我们打算回家调养感冒。

entry.tran: 怀有，抱有(强烈的希望、愿望等)
entry.def: If you nurse an emotion or desire, you feel it strongly for a long time.

example.ex: Jane still nurses the pain of rejection...
example.tran: 简仍因遭到拒绝而痛苦。

example.ex: He had nursed an ambition to lead his own big orchestra.
example.tran: 他一直有一个梦想，希望能指挥一支自己的顶级管弦乐队。

entry.def: A nurse is a person who is trained to look after young children.

example.ex: Every morning she got up early with the children and the nurse.
example.tran: 每天早晨，她和孩子、保姆一起早早起床。

entry.def: When a baby nurses or when its mother nurses it, it feeds by sucking milk from its mother's breast.

example.ex: Most authorities recommend letting the baby nurse whenever it wants.
example.tran: 大部分权威人士建议婴儿饿了就随时喂奶。
给孩子喂奶的年轻妈妈

auth_sentence.content: But not many women nursed back in those days.
auth_sentence.res_content: But not many women nursed back in those days.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But not many women nursed back in those days.

auth_sentence.content: I nursed her for three years with cancer.
auth_sentence.res_content: I nursed her for three years with cancer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I nursed her for three years with cancer.

auth_sentence.content: Even Mitt Romney's strongest supporters nursed reservations about the Republican candidate.
auth_sentence.res_content: Even Mitt Romney's strongest supporters nursed reservations about the Republican candidate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Even Mitt Romney's strongest supporters nursed reservations about the Republican candidate.
